name: zombie city (itch) (GIGI415)
description:
As a survivor of a zombie apocalypse, you must venture into the dark forest in search of a rumored survivor camp. With the help of a friendly ghost, find weapons and ammo to defend yourself against the horde of the zombies.

Regulations:

C: move left

D: move right

Space: jump

S: drop down

Left click: Use the weapon

E: Pick up the item

123 / scroll wheel: choose a equipped weapon
